title: AlarmStorageGetTextId (Function)
text:
FUNCTION AlarmStorageGetTextId : STRING
This function can be used to determine the text id of a message of an alarm,
that was read from the alarm storage.

rows.Name: AlarmStorageGetTextId
rows.Comment:
The text id. An empty string if the corresponding
information cannot be retrieved

rows.Name: udiAlarmGroupId
rows.Comment:
The internal id of the alarm group, that was read from the
alarm storage

rows:
The internal id of the alarm, that was read from the alarm
storage
The 1-based index of the text id.
